content: The code was emailed to you

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kod e-poçt vasitəsilə göndərilmişdir' is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be 'Sizə kod e-poçt vasitəsilə göndərilib' or 'Kod sizə e-poçt vasitəsilə göndərildi'.

The translation 'Ο κωδικός σας εστάλη με email' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'The code was emailed to you'. A more natural Greek equivalent would be 'Σας εστάλη κωδικός με email' or 'Ο κωδικός σας αποστάλη με email'.

The Armenian translation "Կոդն էլ․փոստով ուղարկվել է ձեզ" is not the most natural or idiomatic translation of "The code was emailed to you." While technically correct, it sounds slightly stilted. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of "Ձեզ էլ․փոստով ուղարկվել է ծրագիրը" or "Ծրագիրը ուղարկվել է ձեզ էլ․փոստով".

The Japanese translation 'コードを送りました' literally translates to 'I sent the code'. While understandable, it doesn't directly convey the passive voice of the English 'The code was emailed to you.' A more accurate and natural-sounding translation would be something like 'コードはメールで送られました' (kodo wa meeru de okuraremashita) which means 'The code was sent by email'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コードはメールで送られました

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kod został wysłany' is a literal translation of 'The code was sent.' While understandable, a more natural and contextually accurate translation of 'The code was emailed to you' would be something like 'Kod został wysłany na Twoją skrzynkę e-mail' or 'Kod został wysłany na adres e-mail.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kod został wysłany na Twoją skrzynkę e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Enviamos um email com o código para si' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the natural phrasing in Portuguese. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and less conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'O código foi enviado para o seu email' or 'Receba o código no seu email'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'වි-තැපෑලෙන් කේතය එවා ඇත' is a literal translation but sounds awkward and unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'ඔබේ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලට කේතය යවා ඇත' (Obei vidyut thapealaata keyataya yava athetha) or 'කේතය ඔබගේ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලට යවා ඇත' (Keyata obage vidyut thapealaata yava athetha).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the Slovak translation is understandable, it's a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with better flow.

The translation "Код вам је послат емаил-ом" is not an accurate translation of "The code was emailed to you."  The use of "емаил-ом" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning. It literally translates to 'email-by'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Код вам је послат путем е-поште

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While understandable, 'Код вам је послат путем е-поште' is more formal. A slightly more natural phrasing could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Код је послат на вашу е-маил адресу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Kod vam je poslat email-om" is not an accurate translation of "The code was emailed to you." It literally translates to 'The code was sent via email.' A more accurate translation would convey that the code was sent *in* an email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kod je poslat na vaš email.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "poslat email-om" is somewhat awkward in Serbian. While understandable, it's not the most natural way to express sending something via email.
The translation "代码已通过电子邮件发送给您的" is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Chinese. It doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally as other options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "我们已将验证码发送至您的邮箱" or "验证码已发送到您的邮箱".
